summary: Tony: I don't know where I am exactly. I don't know how far I am or how much time it'll take me to get back to Earth. But I do...
body:
Tony: I don’t know where I am exactly. I don’t know how far I am or how much time it’ll take me to get back to Earth. But I do know two things.

Steve: What are they?

Tony: I love you

Steve: I love you too… What’s the other thing?

Tony: you just said it

summary: can you pleasssse do a scotty and tony making up/realising the other is pretty chill? they're my two favourite characters my...
question: can you pleasssse do a scotty and tony making up/realising the other is pretty chill? they're my two favourite characters my soul needs it
answer:
Here’s the thing that is so frustrating about Scott Lang: he’s good. Tony’s met a million people who are good, but not good. Scott knew what to say to people, what defects are in what tech, and even the old-school tricks of some safes and different banks. 

So it’d be amiss to not approach him with an offer. Even if he didn’t like Stark Industries. 

Scott Lang is currently on house arrest and bored out of his skull. The only thing that breaks up the monotony is a.) listening to Luis talk about the new business, and b.) Cassie. She was probably the only reason that he hadn’t broken out of it. That, and he had the ankle tracker. Ah, the small joys of life. 

He’s not expecting Tony Stark to show up at his door. 

“What the hell are you doing here?” He asks. He’s currently in pajama pants and an old shirt that probably has at least four holes in it at random spots. 

“Here to offer you some interest,” Tony says. “I know house arrest isn’t fun.” 

“Oh, you know?” Scott asks. “Because you’re not the one with an ankle monitor and sheer boredom.” 

“Yeah, because I didn’t break any laws across country borders,” Tony says with a smile. “So. Either I tell you what you can do, or you stay here for the rest of the year in boredom because you can’t go anywhere.” 

Scott takes the damn deal. He’d be stupid not to; it makes more money, so he can finally contribute to Cassie’s college fund. 

He’s surprised at the amount of things that Stark Industries can do, how far their reach extends. 

“Does virtual reality go against my parole?” Scott asks, stumbling as he removes the goggles. 

“You haven’t physically gone anywhere,” Tony says, smiling. “But you’re one of the best at recognizing flaws in stuff. I’ve been…busy.” Scott realizes that he has purple bruises underneath his eyes, and his hands are shaky. 

It gets a little bit easier. Tony notices the small things, of Scott saying goodbye to Cassie at the porch, eyes dimming just a little bit. Tony stressing about things, but pushing it back. 

They have the same sense of bad humor. They laugh at each other. Cassie gets a new uncle that sometimes gives her simple little mind games. The fact that he’s Iron Man is just okay.

title: Guys, I really, really need
body:
Tony Stark and Hank Pym to be insulting each other in the lab, trying to out-do each other, until Princess Shuri comes along and utterly slaughters both of them in front of the whole scientific community, causing Tony and Hank to berudgingly form an alliance in order to beat a new common rival. Rocket Raccoon joins in as well, and an experiment with Pym Particles goes wrong, resulting in a Monty Python skit come to life. 

Shuri and Bruce Banner then step in to help resolve the giant-raccoon situation.

title: Been a Bad Girl, Daddy
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BDbjHU

by starkerchemistry

The anger that follows that burns even hotter, and Bucky has to fight back the immediate growl of ‘mine’ that rides on its heels, and he can’t really pretend anymore that what he’s feeling isn’t arousal, that he isn’t out of his mind with jealousy at the image of his pretty, dolled up son choking on a stranger’s cock in an alley and liking it.

He needs to be alone with Tony, now.

blog.name: superstarks
blog.title: Keep Calm, Watch Black Panther
blog.description: Tony Stark Defense Squad. Shuri Defense Squad, Rhodey & MJ Enthusiast

summary: I love the little touches of futurist Tony we get throughout the mcu. Tony really is the worst case scenario type. Always...
body:
I love the little touches of futurist Tony we get throughout the mcu. Tony really is the worst case scenario type. Always planning ahead.

Not only does he learn from his past failures in relation to his suit creations but he makes sure not only is he prepared but so are his friends.

Despite his issues with Cap he still was preparing him a new shield right after Civil War.

Peter has his suit which is filled with everything Tony started his suit with plus everything he learned from his mistakes. Then made him an even stronger suit because he was still prepared for the Space Invasion and worst case scenario Peter gets involved but is taken care of.

summary: it was just like a song
title: it was just like a song
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2TNLv2R

by quidhitch

Tony takes in the sight before him and sighs— a deep, long sigh, one that reflects the severity of the situation but simultaneously recognizes that he probably brought this on himself.

His ex-husband is currently stretched across Tony’s absurdly expensive futon, drooling onto the microfibre and contorted into a shape that will definitely give him neck pain later. On his chest is a heart-shaped box of chocolates, half of which appear to have been eaten.

Words: 2168, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

by quidhitch

Tony takes in the sight before him and sighs— a deep, long sigh, one that reflects the severity of the situation but simultaneously recognizes that he probably brought this on himself.

His ex-husband is currently stretched across Tony’s absurdly expensive futon, drooling onto the microfibre and contorted into a shape that will definitely give him neck pain later. On his chest is a heart-shaped box of chocolates, half of which appear to have been eaten.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Good Boy Peter
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2N6FA6w

by Her11

Peter Parker has stumbled into something he really shouldn’t have. It was Ned’s fault, well that was wrong it was actually Jameson’s fault for only giving him twenty-four hours to get pictures of something front page worthy before he was fired. Then Ned had given him the tip about some raid going down by the docks, and it was just his luck when it wasn’t a police raid but one gang versus another. Then he had been spotted by James Rhodes, Tony Stark’s right-hand man. That’s why he’s hanging from ropes in a room waiting to be interrogated by none other than Tony Stark himself.
(Tony Stark in 40’s as usual and Peter is 18 or 19)
or
Tony Stark is a mob boss who has set his sites on Peter Parker and isn’t going to let the boy, that he now thinks of as his, go.

Words: 5182, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

tags: i get hearteyes whenever i see him
i just wanna give him a hug
and tell him it's gonna be fine
summary: Tony Stark is a hero and I love him. I want to see him happy and calm and secure in the world he's saved so many times.
body:
Tony Stark is a hero and I love him. I want to see him happy and calm and secure in the world he’s saved so many times.

That’s it. That’s all I wanted to shout into the void today.
